results.headline: Omen, The (Movie)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of The Omen

results.summary_short: Satan's son has arrived on Earth and He's not about to let human parents get in the way.  With its familial and global anxieties, stylish production values, and major stars, "The Omen" became one of the most popular movies of 1976.
